name: Westward Kingdoms
summary: Embark on a marvelous medieval quest to regain the King's favor in Westward® Kingdoms, an all-new adventure from the beloved series.
storyline:
Two young spoiled heirs to the throne are banished from the comforts of their royal realm by the King. To demonstrate to their father that they are the rightful heirs, they are tasked with traveling to three neighboring kingdoms and restoring their greatness. Overconfident and perhaps even arrogant, their trials and tribulations soon teach them a thing or two of what it truly means to be great.

Help Prince Fenwick and Princess Catherine realize their potential in this wonderful real-time adventure. Roam the medieval countryside as they seek the guidance of friendly Kings, Countesses, Dukes, and loyal subjects.
